github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat: Generate a commit message that describes the changes made in the code. The message should be concise and informative, following conventional commit guidelines.
describes in short manner the changes in each file
If the change can not be read, beacuse of a file type like word, pdf, etc., then just write 'file changed'
Try to add emojis to the commit message to make it more engaging and visually appealing.
